trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for storing serialization data for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供基本类，用于存储的数据序列化的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The SerializationStore class is an implementation-specific class that stores serialization data for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService>.
trans-unit.target: SerializationStore 类是一个存储<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService>的序列化数据的特定于实现的类

trans-unit.source: The service adds state to this serialization store.
trans-unit.target: 该服务将状态添加到此序列化存储。

trans-unit.source: Once the store is closed, it can be saved to a stream.
trans-unit.target: 一旦关闭应用商店，可以将它保存到流。

trans-unit.source: A serialization store can be deserialized at a later time by the same type of serialization service.
trans-unit.target: 序列化存储区可以反序列化在更高版本时的相同类型的序列化服务。

trans-unit.source: The SerializationStore class implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface so that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> simply calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: SerializationStore 类实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口以便<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A>只需调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.Close%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.Close%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> </xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Closes the serialization store.
trans-unit.target: 关闭序列化存储区。

trans-unit.source: The Close method closes this store and prevents any objects from being serialized into it.
trans-unit.target: Close 方法关闭此存储区，并阻止任何对象序列化为它。

trans-unit.source: Once closed, the serialization store may be saved.
trans-unit.target: 关闭后，可能会保存序列化存储区。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore"> </xref> ，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 由公共调用此方法`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore>引用。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose()`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of errors that occurred during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 获取序列化或反序列化过程中发生的错误的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains errors that occurred during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>包含序列化或反序列化过程中发生的错误。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Saves the store to the given stream.
trans-unit.target: 将存储保存到给定的流。

trans-unit.source: If the store is open, the Save method will automatically close it for you.
trans-unit.target: 如果商店处于打开状态，则 Save 方法自动将关闭它为你。

trans-unit.source: You can call Save as many times as you wish to save the store to different streams.
trans-unit.target: 你可以根据你想要将存储保存到不同的流多次调用保存。

trans-unit.source: The stream to which the store will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 应用商店将序列化到流。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 释放使用的所有资源<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore"> </xref>。
